CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Granular exclusion
CurrentVersion.description: ,Granular exclusion allows admins to adjust and fine tune indicators according to organizational preferences to help tailor the detection of risks that may lead to a potential security incident. For example, admins can configure the indicator “sending email with attachments to recipients outside the organization” to only detect emails sent to personal domains (e.g., outlook.com). In that way, admins can reduce the number of false positives. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies to manage security and compliance. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy. Note: The cloud environments have been updated to show the current state.  We apologize for any incovenience this may cause.

For example, admins can configure the indicator “sending email with attachments to recipients outside the organization” to only detect emails sent to personal domains (e.g., outlook.com). In that way, admins can reduce the number of false positives. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies to manage security and compliance. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Voice isolation
CurrentVersion.description: With Voice isolation, you can enjoy clear and uninterrupted calls or meetings, no matter where you are. This feature uses AI to filter out all background noise, including other people's voices. By leveraging your voice profile, this advanced noise suppression capability ensures only the user’s voice is transmitted. Whether you are in a busy office, a noisy cafe, or a crowded airport, you can communicate with confidence and clarity. Voice isolation is powered by our advanced deep learning, speech services, and audio processing technology, and it shows our dedication to solving user problems with AI and enhancing audio quality and experience.

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: Improvements for document library version history limits
CurrentVersion.description: ,We are introducing new version controls that help tenant and site admins or document library owners reduce the storage footprint driven by low value file versions. Today, document library owners can set count-based version limits at the individual document library level. With the upcoming changes, tenant and site admins or document library owners will have two version history settings: 1) Automatic mode that intelligently expires new and existing version based on their age and restore probability, and 2) Manual mode that will allow admins to set time-based version expiration and count limits on new and existing versions. These controls enable admins to set an appropriate level of recoverability and auditability for their organization balanced with storage usage considerations. Version history limits and management also apply to OneDrive for Business.

OldVersion.title: SharePoint: Improvements for document library version history limits
OldVersion.description: , We are introducing new version controls that help tenant and site admins or doclib owners reduce the storage footprint driven by low value file versions. Today, document library owners can set count-based version limits at the individual document library level. With the upcoming changes, tenant and site admins or doclib owners will have two version history settings: 1) Automatic mode that intelligently expires new and existing version based on their age and restore probability, and 2) Manual mode that will allow admins to set time-based version expiration and count limits on new and existing versions. These controls enable admins to set an appropriate level of recoverability and auditability for their organization balanced with storage usage considerations. Version history limits and management also apply to OneDrive.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - customization & preview of email notifications
CurrentVersion.description:
,

There are some significant enhancements made to the Microsoft Purview Data Loss Prevention end-user email notification. These improvements provide admins with greater flexibility and control over the end-user notification email: 1. Enhanced Token Support: We have expanded our token library to offer precise and detailed information to your end users. 2. Email Message Customization: You now have the ability to decide whether the matching email messages should be included or excluded in the end-user notification emails. 3. Tailored Email Content: Customize the sender's display name and email body using HTML formatting, allowing for a personalized touch. 4. Email Preview: Prior to sending email notifications, you can review them to ensure they align perfectly with your requirements. These enhancements empower you to refine your communication and provide a more tailored experience for your end users with Microsoft Purview Data Loss Prevention.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Front Row gallery improvements on Teams Rooms on Windows: Active video speaker promotion
CurrentVersion.description: Front Row now promotes pinned or spotlighted participants to the center stage when there is no shared content in the single and dual display mode. For single display mode, when no one is pinned, spotlighted or sharing content, the most recent active speaker video will be promoted to the center. In dual display mode, when no one is pinned, spotlighted or sharing content, the two most recent active speaker videos will be promoted to the center on each screen. If someone is sharing content, the most recent active video speaker will be promoted on the right screen.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Edge: v.121 Enable organizational branding in Edge for Business
CurrentVersion.description:
Enable your organization's branding assets from Entra onto profile-related UI for profiles signed in with an Entra ID (formerly known as Azure Active Directory) account. You can add your organization’s details such as name to the profile pill, name and brand color to the profile flyout, and logo to overlay the Edge for Business taskbar icon. This branding can help users more easily differentiate between multiple profiles and browser windows. Default organizational branding can be enabled by admins through the following policies: OrganizationalBrandingOnWorkProfileUIEnabled and OrganizationLogoOverlayOnAppIconEnabled. Admins will need to have 'company branding' assets configured in the Microsoft Entra admin center for branding assets to be applied to this feature.
More info: https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/deployedge/microsoft-edge-for-business#company-branding

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Edge: Enable organizational branding in Edge for Business

This branding can help users more easily differentiate between multiple profiles and browser windows. CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Stream: Pay-as-you-go transcript translations
CurrentVersion.description:
Make your content more inclusive by creating videos that your coworkers can easily view and understand in their primary language. Transcript translations in Stream (on SharePoint) give you the option to translate the transcript and closed captions of your Stream videos into more than 100 supported languages. To enable translations Admins must first setup billing using an Azure subscription, then they must be enable the feature in the M365 Admin center. Once enabled translations are billed via pay-as-you-go meters.
More info: https://support.microsoft.com/en-us/office/microsoft-syntex-pay-as-you-go-transcript-translations-in-stream-for-sharepoint-2e34ad1b-e213-47ed-a806-5cc0d88751de

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: UX improvements for Multi-Tenant Organization (MTO) users
CurrentVersion.description: This release features user experience improvements when Microsoft Teams users interact with users in another tenant that belongs to their organization (e.g., for conglomerates, as a result of mergers and acquisitions). Key changes include removing the possibility of split 1:1 chat threads, richer profile information, removal of the "External" label, and introducing support for an optional admin configurable label.

CurrentVersion.description: Copilot users can access intelligent recap after meetings to get a summary of the meeting, including: personalized timeline markers to easily browse the recordings by when you joined or left, when a screen was shared, and when your name was mentioned; browse recordings by speakers, chapters, and topics; as well as access AI-generated meeting notes, tasks, and jump to name mentions in the transcript.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Intelligent Recap now available for Copilot users
OldVersion.description: Copilot users can access intelligent recap after meetings to get a summary of the meeting, including: personalized timeline markers to easily browse the recordings by when you joined or left, when a screen was shared, and when your name was mentioned; browse recordings by speakers, chapters, and topics; as well as access AI-generated meeting notes, tasks, and jump to name mentions in the transcript.

CurrentVersion.title: Whiteboard: Text Styles
CurrentVersion.description: This introduces the ability to choose between three different text styles, allowing greater flexibility and personalization of text in whiteboards.

OldVersion.title: Whiteboard: Text Styles
OldVersion.description: This introduces the ability to choose between three different text styles, allowing greater flexibility and personalization of text in whiteboards.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Ability to duplicate an existing town hall for simplified event creation
CurrentVersion.description: Organizers can schedule a new town hall by duplicating information from an existing scheduled one. This includes duplicating information such as details, presenters, theming, and more. The organizer can also edit and update the information as needed for the new event.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Ability to duplicate an existing town hall for simplified event creation
OldVersion.description: Organizers can schedule a new town hall by duplicating information from an existing scheduled one. This includes duplicating information such as details, presenters, theming, and more. The organizer can also edit and update the information as needed for the new event.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Chat for organizers and presenters in town hall
CurrentVersion.description: Organizers, co-organizers, and presenters can chat privately in a separate chat from attendees. This chat is available to access before, during, and after the event.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft 365 admin center: Usage reports - Microsoft Copilot with Graph-grounded chat
CurrentVersion.description: Microsoft Copilot with Graph-grounded chat usage metrics will be included in the Copilot for Microsoft 365 Usage report. This new feature provides additional usage insights and informs adoption strategy decisions for Microsoft Copilot in your organization.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft 365 admin center: Usage reports - Microsoft Copilot with Graph-grounded chat
OldVersion.description: ,Microsoft Copilot with Graph-grounded chat usage metrics will be included in the Copilot for Microsoft 365 Usage report. This new feature provides additional usage insights and informs adoption strategy decisions for Microsoft Copilot in your organization.

CurrentVersion.title: OneDrive: New empty state images
CurrentVersion.description: You will see new and improved images and text in various views on OneDrive for Web when there are no files associated with those views. These images will appear in new OneDrive accounts that have no stored files, and they may appear in existing OneDrive accounts that have no recent, favorited, shared, or recycled files. As an example, if you have no favorited files, you will see an image of a star with text that reads “Items you favorite will show up here."

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Pulse - Integration into Microsoft Copilot Dashboard from Viva Insights
CurrentVersion.description: Initiate a Copilot impact survey that helps leaders and IT admins understand the return on investment of rolling out Copilot and AI tools across their organizations. Viva Pulse provides a way for organizations to capture sentiment data that maps to work patterns data from Viva Insights to measure AI adoption.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Custom background for Teams Rooms on Android
CurrentVersion.description: IT admins can upload custom background images on the Teams admin center to reinforce their company brand on their Teams Rooms devices. The main room display, extended room display, and touch console can each have its own specific background image. PNG, JPG, and JPEG, formats are supported. This feature is only available with the Teams Rooms Pro license.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Audit - New Exchange and SharePoint Logs for Microsoft Purview Audit Standard Users
CurrentVersion.description: ,Microsoft Purview is expanding access to wider cloud security activity events for Microsoft Exchange and SharePoint. As part of the changes, standard users of Purview Audit will begin to generate four new Microsoft Exchange and SharePoint events that were previously generated only for Audit Premium licensed users: MailItemsAccessed, Send, SearchQueryInitiatedExchange, and SearchQueryInitiatedSharepoint. The following logs will differ based on the user’s license and additional metadata will be added to Exchange logs when the user is assigned an Audit Premium license: SensitivityLabel for MailItemsAccessed.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Drag and drop to download attachments and emails in the new Outlook for Windows
CurrentVersion.description: Users can drag and drop attachments and emails from the new Outlook for Windows to their desktops or local folders to download them directly to that location.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Trigger Power automate workflows as outcome of DLP rule match
CurrentVersion.description: ,This introduces a new DLP rule action to trigger custom Power automate workflows when a DLP rule is violated.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Trigger Power automate workflows as outcome of DLP rule match
CurrentVersion.description: ,This introduces a new DLP rule action to trigger custom Power automate workflows when a DLP rule is violated.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Zero Touch Provisioning of Microsoft Teams Rooms on Windows devices
CurrentVersion.description: Zero touch provisioning is a feature that allows you to deploy Microsoft Teams Rooms on Windows devices without any physical intervention at the site. It leverages Windows Autopilot and auto-login technologies to automate the enrollment and configuration of the devices from the cloud, using the credentials stored in the Microsoft Teams Rooms Pro Management. With Zero touch provisioning, you can reduce the deployment time and cost and improve the security and compliance.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams for Education: iOS/Android Parent link for School Connection
CurrentVersion.description: Allows parents to connect to School Connection in Teams for Education by clicking the iOS/Android mobile link provided by their school’s administration.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Meeting ID and passcode to join Teams Rooms on Android
CurrentVersion.description: IT Admins can configure and require a meeting ID and passcode to join a meeting on Teams Rooms on Android to ensure a level of security and privacy. This feature is only available with the Teams Rooms Pro license.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Ability to change language on Microsoft Teams Rooms on Windows
CurrentVersion.description: Users can change the default app language on Microsoft Teams Rooms on Windows by tapping "More" and then "Language" on the room console. Admins can select up to three languages that users can pick from in the room.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Search: Video Search in Bing, Office.com, SharePoint
CurrentVersion.description: Our new Video vertical on Bing, Office.com, and SharePoint will provide better search capabilities for videos in your organization.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: screen recorder on mobile device
CurrentVersion.description: You can use Teams on your Android device to record your screen and share it with others in any channel or chat. Just press and hold the camera icon next to the compose box and then tap the screen recorder icon to begin the recording.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Meeting recap and meeting artifacts automatically shared in chat after meeting
CurrentVersion.description: Shortly after a meeting ends, meeting participants will automatically get a set of all the artifacts from the meeting in the meeting chat. Included in this set is a quick entry point to the meeting recap page, the transcript, the recording, Collaborative notes, any files that were shared, a link to any Whiteboard that was used, and the meeting details like date and time of the meeting event. For Teams Premium users, in addition to the entry point to intelligent recap, users will also see highlights like number of speakers, number of name mentions, and suggested tasks.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Expanded incoming call setting options for Teams Phone Mobile users
CurrentVersion.description: Teams Phone Mobile users will now the flexibility to choose whether group calls, calls received as part of a call queue, and meeting nudges are received natively on their mobile phone or in the Teams app. This new capability enables greater flexibility and mobility and allows users to easily move these calls between their native dialer or the Teams app without interruption.

CurrentVersion.title: OneDrive: Copilot in OneDrive
CurrentVersion.description: Copilot in OneDrive, available on OneDrive for Web, will allow you to ask questions and get information from files in your OneDrive without having to open the files. It will also summarize one or multiple files. Copilot in OneDrive will work on the following file types: DOC, DOCX, FLUID, LOOP, PPT, PPTX, XLSX, PDF, ODT, ODP, RTF, ASPX, RTF, TXT, HTM, and HTML. Copilot in OneDrive requires a Microsoft Copilot for Microsoft 365 license.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Edge: Moving Managed Site Indicator (Briefcase icon) into the lock icon in the address bar omnibox
CurrentVersion.description: The briefcase icon which signals that a page is managed, has been moved into the lock icon within the address bar. If an admin would like to see whether there are protections for a given page, they can click to open the lock icon in the address bar to look for the briefcase icon.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Ultrasound proximity join admin controls for Teams Rooms on Windows
CurrentVersion.description: IT admins can use XML files to enable two proximity join settings for Teams Rooms on Windows: enabling ultrasound signals for a user to accurately find and choose a room to join a meeting from, and whether the Teams Rooms automatically accepts the ring from the user's laptop to join the meeting.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Workflows within File Chiclet
CurrentVersion.description: You will now be able to run instant workflows and create new file workflows via the file chiclet overflow menu (...)

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft To Do: Grid view for tasks in Microsoft To Do
CurrentVersion.description: Tasks can now be seen in a grid view in the web version of Microsoft To Do as well as when using To Do in other apps like Microsoft Outlook.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Collaborative notes in GCC and GCC-H
CurrentVersion.description: Collaborative notes allow meeting attendees to co-create and collaborate on their meeting agenda, notes, and action items.  Since Collaborative notes are a Loop component, it is always in sync regardless of how many places they live in.  Assigned Tasks in Collaborative notes automatically sync with ToDo & Planner.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Defender for Office 365: Copy simulation action in Attack Simulation Training
CurrentVersion.description: Using the copy simulation action button, Attack simulation administrators will be able to effortlessly duplicate existing simulations and make necessary edits to introduce fresh and tailored simulation scenarios.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Optimize for Video setting for screensharing
CurrentVersion.description: Provide setting to optimize screen sharing for video clip by reducing the lag and improving the quality of video playback when sharing video clips in Teams meetings

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Breakout rooms support for Microsoft Teams Rooms on Windows
CurrentVersion.description: With breakout room support, Teams Rooms on Windows can be added to a breakout room and moved in and out of the main room making it easy for breakout session coordination.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Breakout rooms support for Microsoft Teams Rooms on Windows
OldVersion.description:
With breakout room support, Teams Rooms on
Windows can be added to a breakout room and moved in and out of the main room
making it easy for breakout session coordination.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Meeting ID and passcode to join on Teams Rooms on Windows
CurrentVersion.description: IT Admins can configure and require a meeting ID and passcode to join a meeting on Teams Rooms on Windows to ensure higher levels of security and privacy. This feature is available for Teams Rooms Pro customers.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Meeting ID and passcode to join on Teams Rooms on Windows
CurrentVersion.description: IT Admins can configure and require a meeting ID and passcode to join a meeting on Teams Rooms on Windows to ensure higher levels of security and privacy. This feature is available for Teams Rooms Pro customers.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Syntex: Pay-as-you-go Preview
CurrentVersion.description: ,With this limited-time preview, you will be able to use Unstructured Document Processing and see where pages are processed across your tenant.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Syntex: Accounts Payable In-product site template
CurrentVersion.description: Licensed Syntex users will be able to apply an accounts payable site template directly from the in-product template gallery.  This template includes automatic data classification and extraction using a prebuilt invoice model, a preconfigured content assembly model and various sample webparts, lists and libraries to inspire you. It also includes learning material about how to use and extend this template to customize it for your own use case!

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Forms: new distribution experience for in-org and external forms
CurrentVersion.description: Now by using Forms, users can send forms with the permission setting of anyone can respond to external users by email. Also, a preview of your distribution email sent from Forms will be shown in the sending dialog.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Forms: new cover page templates for forms and surveys
CurrentVersion.description: Design your cover page for forms or surveys by selecting from new AI suggested templates within the Theme setting pane. In the Theme setting pane, users can easily design a cover page for their forms by picking from several AI suggested template for any scenarios.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Forms: Invitation card, the new type of cover page
CurrentVersion.description: Forms users will be able to create an elegant invitation card for casual events and parties with background music and vivid images.

CurrentVersion.title: Meeting organizers can manage who can record and transcribe meetings (Premium)
CurrentVersion.description: We are expanding the existing ‘Who can record’ control for meeting organizers to include transcription. With this change, meeting organizers with a Teams Premium license will see a control called ‘Who can record and transcribe’ in the meeting options, which allows meeting organizers to select from two options: (1) organizers and co-organizers, or (2) organizers, co-organizers, and presenters. This control allows meeting organizers to manage which roles are able to initiate recording and transcription for a meeting.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Lifecycle Management - Scope the administration of retention and retention label policies (U.S. government clouds)
CurrentVersion.description: Organizations can leverage Administrative Units in Azure Active Directory to define who can configure and manage policies in Microsoft Purview. This update will include the ability to set a Records Management admin for a specific geography, department, or other unit, who can manage retention and retention label policies for their unit.

CurrentVersion.title: Whiteboard: Connectors (Line Anchoring)
CurrentVersion.description: This feature will provide the ability to create more effective flowcharts and diagrams by allowing you to anchor lines between different shapes, making them move and reroute along with connected shapes.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva Engage:  Storyline Announcements
CurrentVersion.description: Official leaders can create ‘announcement’ storyline posts that reach their audience directly in email and Teams notifications.  Post on behalf of another user allows the user to assign a delegate who can post to their storyline on their behalf.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Syntex: Pay-as-you-go General Availability
CurrentVersion.description: Customers of Microsoft Syntex will be able to enter an Azure subscription to pay for Syntex services on a pay-as-you-go basis.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Ability to recommend courses to groups
CurrentVersion.description: Allows users to use existing user groups while making recommendations.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Additional filters for search results
CurrentVersion.description: Viva learning will be supporting more filters on Language and Content Type fields in search results page.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Actionable card based Loop components
CurrentVersion.description: Add a Microsoft 365 app that supports link unfurling with an actionable card-based Loop component, and Outlook will show the component when inserting supported links in your email messages. You will be able to choose between the new embedded card or a link when sending email.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: On-demand recordings in Webinars
CurrentVersion.description: Organizers can publish the recording of a webinar and automatically send an email to attendees where they receive a link to watch an on-demand recording of the webinar that is hosted on the event page.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Granular exclusion
CurrentVersion.description: ,Granular exclusion allows admins to adjust and fine tune indicators according to organizational preferences to help tailor the detection of risks that may lead to a potential security incident. For example, admins can configure the indicator “sending email with attachments to recipients outside the organization” to only detect emails sent to personal domains (e.g., outlook.com). In that way, admins can reduce the number of false positives. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies to manage security and compliance. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy. Note: The cloud environments have been updated to show the current state.  We apologize for any incovenience this may cause.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft OneDrive: Open in App
CurrentVersion.description:
,
With this feature, users on OneDrive and SharePoint web can open non-Office files in desktop apps to view and make changes to those files. Any changes they make will sync back to OneDrive or SharePoint.

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: Video Pages
CurrentVersion.description: Create video centric page content, like highlighting meeting content or executive messages with the new video pages templates - presenting them inline, playable, and beautiful. These templates are available in both SharePoint and Stream, making it easy to showcase video with a customized and branded pages experience from either application.

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: Microsoft Lists- A new forms experience to collect information
CurrentVersion.description: We are making it easier to collect information with an updated forms experience for Microsoft Lists. Forms look clean, are easy to design, can be easily shared, and respondents are able to fill them out on any device. All form responses appear immediately in your list after recipient clicks the submit button.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Syntex: Optical Character Recognition (OCR) for SharePoint and OneDrive
CurrentVersion.description: ,With this update, you will be able to turn on OCR for images in SharePoint and OneDrive on a pay-as-you-go basis. The extracted text will be made available to Microsoft Search and Microsoft Purview.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Syntex: Optical Character Recognition in OneDrive and SharePoint supports multi-page PDF and TIFF files
CurrentVersion.description:
,
Currently, OCR is available only for standalone Images. With this update image-only PDF and TIFF files in OneDrive and SharePoint will also benefit from OCR.

CurrentVersion.title: Forms: New Present mode shares surveys or quizzes live through QR code or URL
CurrentVersion.description:
,
You can now share a survey or quiz by selecting “Present” mode. The survey can be accessed via QR code or URL from any screen. Results are viewed on the same screen, dynamically updated as information is gathered.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview: Data Loss Prevention - messages delivered to hosted Quarantine for Exchange Online is moving to quarantine page in Microsoft 365 Defender portal
CurrentVersion.description: The messages delivered to hosted quarantine matching a DLP policy is moving from Exchange transport rule to the Quarantine page in the Microsoft 365 Defender portal.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Syntex: Customers with the seat license can sign up for Pay-as-you-go services
CurrentVersion.description: Customers with Syntex seat licenses can also sign up for new Pay-as-you-go services.  Microsoft will not charge pay-as-you-go for services that are covered under the seat license.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: work hours and location
CurrentVersion.description: Set your work location for the day so your team can learn about your availability for in-office and remote collaboration. Click on a user's avatar or profile photo anywhere in Teams and get an overview of their online status, the next available calendar slot in Outlook, work hours, local time, and work location (remote or office).

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Voice isolation
CurrentVersion.description: With Voice isolation, you can enjoy clear and uninterrupted calls or meetings, no matter where you are. This feature uses AI to filter out all background noise, including other people's voices. By leveraging your voice profile, this advanced noise suppression capability ensures only the user’s voice is transmitted. Whether you are in a busy office, a noisy cafe, or a crowded airport, you can communicate with confidence and clarity. Voice isolation is powered by our advanced deep learning, speech services, and audio processing technology, and it shows our dedication to solving user problems with AI and enhancing audio quality and experience.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: New chat experience in Microsoft Edge
CurrentVersion.description: When opening web links from Microsoft Teams chats in Microsoft Edge, users will see the web links open side-by-side with their Teams chats, with the Teams chats next in the Edge sidebar.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Preview and playback of Stream videos inline in Teams chat and channels
CurrentVersion.description: Stream videos that are saved in OneDrive and SharePoint are now embedded in chat and channels enabling users to preview and play them directly in Teams without the need to open a browser window. Note: We are adjusting the roadmap release phase to reflect the current state. We apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Collaborative notes on Teams mobile
CurrentVersion.description: Collaborative notes allow meeting attendees to co-create and collaborate on their meeting agenda, notes, and action items. Since Collaborative notes are a Loop component, it is always in sync regardless of how many places they live in. Assigned Tasks in Collaborative notes automatically sync with ToDo & Planner.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Workflows App
CurrentVersion.description: All workflow capabilities in Teams (powered by Power Automate) will be consolidated under the new Workflows app. Within the Workflows personal app you’ll be able to manage all Teams related workflows. Users will also be able to create and kick off workflows through the Message Extension, a new entry point in addition to Message Actions.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Watermark support for recording playback (Premium)
CurrentVersion.description: Recording can now be enabled for watermarked meetings. An email ID will be displayed as the watermark during the meeting recording playback. Once a meeting has concluded, users can access the recorded content on both web and mobile platforms to watch the recording with watermarking.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams Admin Center: Deploy and manage Shifts for your frontline teams in the Teams Admin Center
CurrentVersion.description: Admins will gain the ability to standardize Shifts settings (open shifts, swap shifts requests, offer shifts requests, time off requests and time clock), identify schedule owners, and create scheduling groups uniformly for all frontline teams at the tenant level.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Deploy your frontline operational hierarchy in the Teams Admin Center
CurrentVersion.description: Admins will be able to set up their frontline operational hierarchy to map their organization’s structure of frontline teams/locations to a hierarchy in the Teams Admin Center. Admins can also define attributes for their teams that range from department information to brand information. The operational hierarchy coupled with this added metadata will enable numerous frontline apps and experiences in the future like task publishing and additional frontline capabilities that are coming soon.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Deploy your frontline operational hierarchy in the Teams Admin Center
CurrentVersion.description: Admins will be able to set up their frontline operational hierarchy to map their organization’s structure of frontline teams/locations to a hierarchy in the Teams Admin Center. Admins can also define attributes for their teams that range from department information to brand information. The operational hierarchy coupled with this added metadata will enable numerous frontline apps and experiences in the future like task publishing and additional frontline capabilities that are coming soon.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Deploy your frontline operational hierarchy in the Teams Admin Center
CurrentVersion.description: Admins will be able to set up their frontline operational hierarchy to map their organization’s structure of frontline teams/locations to a hierarchy in the Teams Admin Center. Admins can also define attributes for their teams that range from department information to brand information. The operational hierarchy coupled with this added metadata will enable numerous frontline apps and experiences in the future like task publishing and additional frontline capabilities that are coming soon.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Forms: Migrate Google Forms through the M365 Admin Center
CurrentVersion.description: Support Google Forms to Microsoft Forms migration via M365 admin center.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Extended Real-time telemetry retention for upto 7 days (Premium)
CurrentVersion.description: To facilitate meeting quality troubleshooting for admins in Teams admin center, real-time telemetry available during the meeting will be retained for an extended period of time (up to 7 days after meeting is ended) for users with Premium licenses. This will help admins identify and fix quality issues using granular telemetry after the meeting is over for up to 7 days. Note: We have updated the release phase and month to reflect the current state. We apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: Improvements for document library version history limits
CurrentVersion.description: ,We are introducing new version controls that help tenant and site admins or document library owners reduce the storage footprint driven by low value file versions. Today, document library owners can set count-based version limits at the individual document library level. With the upcoming changes, tenant and site admins or document library owners will have two version history settings: 1) Automatic mode that intelligently expires new and existing version based on their age and restore probability, and 2) Manual mode that will allow admins to set time-based version expiration and count limits on new and existing versions. These controls enable admins to set an appropriate level of recoverability and auditability for their organization balanced with storage usage considerations. Version history limits and management also apply to OneDrive for Business.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Bring your own content to learning paths with external URL support
CurrentVersion.description: Bring your own content to learning paths in Viva Learning. This includes both external URLs (YouTube, Vimeo, news articles, etc) and internal URLs (SharePoint links).

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Engage - Answers in Communities
CurrentVersion.description: Introducing Answers for Viva Engage communities: premium license holders can see 'Top related questions' in the question publisher, gain badges for answering questions in communities, and view their activity through Answers Analytics.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - customization & preview of email notifications
CurrentVersion.description:
,

There are some significant enhancements made to the Microsoft Purview Data Loss Prevention end-user email notification. These improvements provide admins with greater flexibility and control over the end-user notification email: 1. Enhanced Token Support: We have expanded our token library to offer precise and detailed information to your end users. 2. Email Message Customization: You now have the ability to decide whether the matching email messages should be included or excluded in the end-user notification emails. 3. Tailored Email Content: Customize the sender's display name and email body using HTML formatting, allowing for a personalized touch. 4. Email Preview: Prior to sending email notifications, you can review them to ensure they align perfectly with your requirements. These enhancements empower you to refine your communication and provide a more tailored experience for your end users with Microsoft Purview Data Loss Prevention.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Ability to change retention period on labels set to start retention based on “When items were labeled”
CurrentVersion.description: Previously, admins could not change the retention period set on existing labels configured to start retention from when items were labeled. This feature will remove this restriction, and the resulting behavior will be consistent with other retention label types.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Viva App Bar integration in Viva Learning Webapp
CurrentVersion.description: Viva Learning Webapp will have an easy way to switch across other Viva Webapp modules. Note: Rolling this item back to "in development" per our email chain - this item was prematurely updated to launched, and has been reverted to it’s correct status.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Management of BYOD (Bring your own device) meeting spaces with Teams Rooms Pro Management
CurrentVersion.description: The BYOD (bring your own device) rooms in the Pro Management Portal provides IT admins with a comprehensive overview of their BYOD rooms' utilization and activities. With this new addition, IT admins will gain valuable insights into how these spaces are being utilized, enabling them to make data driven decisions.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Front Row gallery improvements on Teams Rooms on Windows: Active video speaker promotion
CurrentVersion.description: Front Row now promotes pinned or spotlighted participants to the center stage when there is no shared content in the single and dual display mode. For single display mode, when no one is pinned, spotlighted or sharing content, the most recent active speaker video will be promoted to the center. In dual display mode, when no one is pinned, spotlighted or sharing content, the two most recent active speaker videos will be promoted to the center on each screen. If someone is sharing content, the most recent active video speaker will be promoted on the right screen.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning Webapp Domain update to "learning.cloud.microsoft"
CurrentVersion.description: Viva Learning Webapp will be migrated to a new domain: learning.cloud.microsoft. Links from the previous domain are backwards compatible and supported.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Microsoft Shell integration in Viva Learning webapp
CurrentVersion.description: Viva Learning Webapp will have an Application Header similar to other Microsoft M365 webapps. It will help users to easily switch between Microsoft webapps.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Spell check in Viva Learning search
CurrentVersion.description: User queries will be spell checked and corrected for all in-app Search.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams Admin Center: Configure maintenance window for Teams devices
CurrentVersion.description: Admins will be able to configure the maintenance window for their Teams devices from within the Teams Admin Center. These time windows will be used for executing any device upkeep operations, including automatic updates.

CurrentVersion.title: Whiteboard: Microsoft Forms Poll Loop component live copy/paste
CurrentVersion.description: The ability to copy/paste existing Microsoft Forms Poll Loop components into Whiteboard and vice versa.

CurrentVersion.title: Whiteboard: @ mentions within comments
CurrentVersion.description: The ability to @ mention users within comments on a whiteboard, with the associated in-app indicators to inform users of an @ mention.

CurrentVersion.title: Whiteboard: Email notifications for @ mentions in comments on a whiteboard
CurrentVersion.description: The ability for @mentions within comments on a whiteboard to trigger an email notification to the user, with a link back to the @mention.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Pulse - Organization-wide template and question customization
CurrentVersion.description: Create organization-wide templates and questions for managers and project leads to use.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Microsoft 365 Groups connected Viva Goals Teams
CurrentVersion.description: Users will now save time with a simplified set-up experience for setting up their Viva Goals Teams.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Microsoft 365 Groups connected Viva Goals Teams
CurrentVersion.description: Users will now save time with a simplified set-up experience for setting up their Viva Goals Teams.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Goals – Improved introductory experience for new users
CurrentVersion.description: With this release, a default company-wide organization will be available for new tenants when they start with Viva Goals. Users will have an improved onboarding experience that will help them get started with Viva Goals.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Goals – Improved introductory experience for new users
CurrentVersion.description: With this release, a default company-wide organization will be available for new tenants when they start with Viva Goals. Users will have an improved onboarding experience that will help them get started with Viva Goals.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Ability to hide Favorites from folder list
CurrentVersion.description: The Hide Favorites feature allows users to personalize their folder pane by hiding the Favorites section. By default, Favorites will be visible, but with this feature, users have the option to hide the Favorites experience from their view. Once hidden, users can always go back and unhide their Favorites.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Redirect incoming call directly to voicemail from incoming call notification
CurrentVersion.description: Allows users to easily redirect an incoming call to voicemail without having to accept or reject the call when receiving calls on a Teams certified phone device.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Chat button on missed call activity
CurrentVersion.description: Easily stay in touch with your contacts after a missed call. A new chat button is added to your activity feed, enabling you to follow up on a missed call and start a chat with just one click.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - New fields added to Activity Explorer
CurrentVersion.description: ,Added Protection Event Type and Protection Type fields in Activity Explorer for sensitivity label applied, sensitivity labels updated, and sensitivity label removed.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - New fields added to Activity Explorer.
CurrentVersion.description: Added Protection Event Type and Protection Type fields in Activity Explorer for sensitivity label applied, sensitivity labels updated, and sensitivity label removed.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Post articles in Viva Engage
CurrentVersion.description: With articles, you can write longer, more thoughtful posts with inline images, sections, headings, and more.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: The new Outlook for Windows - Offline support for mail actions and compose
CurrentVersion.description: The first set of offline capabilities in the new Outlook for Windows. Mail, calendar events, and contacts will be stored on your device, so you can view them even when you're not connected to the internet. Additionally, you can perform key actions on your mail, including flag, move, and delete, and compose messages, to stay productive even when you're not connected to the internet.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Organize folders in your sidebar
CurrentVersion.description: ,Users can arrange folders in any desired order effortlessly by dragging and dropping the folders in the position that they want.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Audit - New Stream Logs for Microsoft Purview Audit Standard Users
CurrentVersion.description: Microsoft Purview is expanding access to wider cloud security activity events for Microsoft Stream. As part of the changes, standard users of Purview Audit will begin to generate 5 new Microsoft Stream events that were previously generated only for Audit Premium licensed users. The following events will now be provided for all Audit Standard users: 1. StreamInvokeGetTranscript; 2. StreamInvokeChannelView; 3. StreamInvokeGetTextTrack; 4. StreamInvokeGetVideo; 5. StreamInvokeGroupView

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention for endpoints-Support for Two New Predicates on Endpoint DLP
CurrentVersion.description:
,With this capability, admins can extend the two below mentioned predicates to Microsoft Purview DLP for Endpoint 
- Document Property is
- Document name contains words or phrases

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Audit - New Exchange and SharePoint Logs for Microsoft Purview Audit Standard Users
CurrentVersion.description:
,
Microsoft Purview is expanding access to wider cloud security activity events for Microsoft Exchange and SharePoint. As part of the changes, standard users of Purview Audit will begin to generate 4 new Microsoft Exchange and SharePoint events that were previously generated only for Audit Premium licensed users. The following events will now be provided for all Audit Standard users: 1. MailItemsAccessed; 2. Send; 3. SearchQueryInitiatedExchange; 4. SearchQueryInitiatedSharepoint; The following logs will differ based upon the user’s license. This following additional metadata is added to Exchange logs when the user is assigned an Audit Premium license: Premium Insight 1: SensitivityLabel for MailItemsAccessed

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Custom backgrounds for announcement posts in channels (Premium)
CurrentVersion.description: Teams users will be able to create engaging custom backgrounds for channel announcements in just a few clicks. For Teams Premium, users will have additional access to DALL-E, a text to image generator, to generate images for their backgrounds.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Defender for Office 365: Admins can provide intent while submitting
CurrentVersion.description: Admins submitting to Microsoft can convey whether they are submitting for a second opinion or they are submitting to convey their confirmation of clean or malicious verdict.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Defender for Office 365: Last used date inside Tenant Allow Block List
CurrentVersion.description: Tenant allow block list domains & addresses, URL, and file entries will show last used date. This helps admins understand when an entry was last used (either at mailflow or time of click), helping them remove entries which are no longer needed.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: New Shared display mode for BYOD meeting rooms
CurrentVersion.description: The new shared display mode provides users the ability to extend their Teams meeting via a pop-out and view-only version of the stage onto the TV screen in BYOD meeting rooms. This mode ensures the meeting content is extended to the front of the room for others to see and provides the host the peace of mind their desktop is for their viewing only, minimizes the personal information that others in the room can see.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Stream video recordings in the new Outlook for Windows and web
CurrentVersion.description: We're introducing the ability to record and insert Stream video recordings in Outlook on the web and the new Outlook for Windows. Soon you will be able to record a video of yourself, your screen or both, directly from Outlook and insert the recording in your email.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Defender for Office 365: Attack Simulation Training in DoD
CurrentVersion.description: Attack simulation and training (AST) in the Microsoft Defender for Office 365 is an intelligent risk reduction tool, which allows customers to run realistic attack scenarios in their organization, identify vulnerable users, and help drive behavior change through an integrated security awareness training program. It is to be made available in the DoD environment.

CurrentVersion.title: Power BI: Microsoft Copilot Dashboard from Viva Insights
CurrentVersion.description: ,The Microsoft Copilot Dashboard is a new Power BI app from Viva Insights that helps organizational leaders prepare for rollout, and track adoption and impact of Microsoft Copilot for Microsoft 365. Note: We have made the decision to cancel this planned release.  We apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: High and Low importance
CurrentVersion.description: You can now send email with High or Low importance from Outlook for iOS.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft 365 admin center: Usage reports - Overview page redesign
CurrentVersion.description: The Microsoft 365 admin center Usage report Overview page has been redesigned to better navigate the most important usage insights in your organization. The redesign includes new engagement metrics such as enabled and active users, user state compositions (e.g. first time, returning users), storage by product, and key usage metrics for Microsoft 365 products.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: High and Low Importance
CurrentVersion.description: You can now send email with High or Low importance from Outlook for Android

CurrentVersion.title: Azure Active Directory: Cross-tenant manager synchronization
CurrentVersion.description: ,Cross-tenant synchronization will support provisioning a user's manager across tenants.  For existing synchronization configurations that use the default schema (where you haven't made any customizations to the attribute mappings or scoping rules), the manager will start to provision automatically for new users. For existing synchronization configurations that do not use the default schema, you can add the manager attribute to your attribute mappings.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - Full File Evidence for all workloads in Activity Explorer
CurrentVersion.description: ,This feature grants the user the capability to view the source link of the file associated with the activity flagged in Activity Explorer.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - Modernized user-defined permissions experience
CurrentVersion.description: ,A modernized experience for selecting which users should have which permissions when a sensitivity label configured for user-defined permissions is applied to a file in M365 apps or when a user applies protection using standalone Information Rights Management.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: To Do app opens in the new Outlook for Windows
CurrentVersion.description: Use the To Do app without leaving the new Outlook for Windows! Clicking the To Do icon in the navigation bar will open inline and will no longer open in a separate browser window.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: To Do app opens in the new Outlook for Windows
CurrentVersion.description: Use the To Do app without leaving the new Outlook for Windows! Clicking the To Do icon in the navigation bar will open inline and will no longer open in a separate browser window.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Control your mic state during meetings from Windows taskbar available in the new Teams on Windows
CurrentVersion.description: This feature, available in the new Teams experience on Windows, enables you to mute and unmute your audio by clicking the mic icon in Windows taskbar. To control your mic during the meeting from the taskbar, do the following: select the mic icon on your taskbar or press Windows logo key + Alt + K to mute or unmute.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Search: Customize default verticals, add verticals and filters
CurrentVersion.description: New support for Microsoft Search allows you to customize out of the box verticals for Microsoft Search and add new verticals and filters based on SharePoint content.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Intune: Work hour access controls for Front Line Workers
CurrentVersion.description: Allows IT admins to establish no Teams notifications or access when workers clock out of work.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Information Protection: Microsoft 365 Apps | Office Apps in Android applications can create PDFs that inherit the source files sensitivity labels
CurrentVersion.description: PDFs created from Word, Excel, and PowerPoint will inherit their source files sensitivity labels in Office for the Android applications when the label is unencrypted.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Information Protection: Microsoft 365 Apps | Office Apps in iOS applications can create PDFs that inherit the source files sensitivity labels
CurrentVersion.description: PDFs created from Word, Excel, and PowerPoint will inherit their source files sensitivity labels in Office for the iOS applications when the label is unencrypted.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention- Out-of-box Advanced Hunting queries for Data Loss Prevention incidents in Microsoft 365 Defender
CurrentVersion.description: Organizations can click the "Go Hunt” dropdown from the DLP alert page in Microsoft 365 Defender and select from a list of pre-populated queries for common scenarios such as understanding if a file is shared externally, participants of a Teams meetings, and more.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Microsoft Teams admin center - external domain activity report
CurrentVersion.description: The external domain activity report will show Teams administrators which domains their users communicate with. Available for both those with open federation on and those with explicit allow lists.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Organizers can select languages for translation in a town hall
CurrentVersion.description: Town hall organizers will be able to select the caption languages that will be available to the attendees for translation. Currently the languages are preset for attendees to pick from; now organizers will be able to select the six translated languages available to attendees.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: 3P eCDN support for town halls (Premium)
CurrentVersion.description: Admins have the ability to disable Microsoft first party eCDN at a user level within a tenant for users licensed with Teams Premium and switch the users back to using a third-party eCDN as they prefer.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Defender for Office 365: 45 days after last used for Allow
CurrentVersion.description: Admins can configure allows to be removed after 45 days from the last used date. This way they can keep ensuring the delivery of the emails till the filtering has learned.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Copilot for Sales plugin for Copilot in Teams meetings
CurrentVersion.description: Admins can enable the Copilot for Sales plugin in the plugin menu. All plugins are toggled ‘off’ by default, and users can toggle it ‘on’ from the plugin menu. When Copilot for Sales plugin is set to ‘on,’ Copilot in Teams meetings will be able to access Sales and Dynamics 365 data to return insights for a summary of the sales opportunity for the meeting based on the transcript, as well as retrieve brand information for the account from Dynamics 365 if the account name was mentioned.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - Save filters for Activity Explorer
CurrentVersion.description: ,Ability to save the filters applied to Activity Explorer and use them later.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Topics in Viva Engage
CurrentVersion.description: Adding topics to posts in Viva Engage will default open for question post types and be aligned with new topic experiences as seen in Answers in Viva.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Ability to duplicate an existing webinar for simplified event creation
CurrentVersion.description: Organizers can schedule a new webinar by duplicating information from an existing scheduled one. This includes duplicating information such as details, presenters, theming, and more. The organizer can also edit and update the information as needed for the new event.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Edge: v.121 Enable organizational branding in Edge for Business
CurrentVersion.description:
Enable your organization's branding assets from Entra onto profile-related UI for profiles signed in with an Entra ID (formerly known as Azure Active Directory) account. You can add your organization’s details such as name to the profile pill, name and brand color to the profile flyout, and logo to overlay the Edge for Business taskbar icon. This branding can help users more easily differentiate between multiple profiles and browser windows. Default organizational branding can be enabled by admins through the following policies: OrganizationalBrandingOnWorkProfileUIEnabled and OrganizationLogoOverlayOnAppIconEnabled. Admins will need to have 'company branding' assets configured in the Microsoft Entra admin center for branding assets to be applied to this feature.
More info: https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/deployedge/microsoft-edge-for-business#company-branding

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Stream: Pay-as-you-go transcript translations
CurrentVersion.description:
Make your content more inclusive by creating videos that your coworkers can easily view and understand in their primary language. Transcript translations in Stream (on SharePoint) give you the option to translate the transcript and closed captions of your Stream videos into more than 100 supported languages. To enable translations Admins must first setup billing using an Azure subscription, then they must be enable the feature in the M365 Admin center. Once enabled translations are billed via pay-as-you-go meters.
More info: https://support.microsoft.com/en-us/office/microsoft-syntex-pay-as-you-go-transcript-translations-in-stream-for-sharepoint-2e34ad1b-e213-47ed-a806-5cc0d88751de

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: UX improvements for Multi-Tenant Organization (MTO) users
CurrentVersion.description: This release features user experience improvements when Microsoft Teams users interact with users in another tenant that belongs to their organization (e.g., for conglomerates, as a result of mergers and acquisitions). Key changes include removing the possibility of split 1:1 chat threads, richer profile information, removal of the "External" label, and introducing support for an optional admin configurable label.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Organizers can select languages for translation in a town hall (Premium)
CurrentVersion.description: Town hall organizers will be able to select the caption languages that will be available to the attendees for translation. Currently the languages are preset for attendees to pick from; now organizers will be able to select the 10 translated languages available to attendees.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Intelligent Recap now available for Copilot users
CurrentVersion.description: Copilot users can access intelligent recap after meetings to get a summary of the meeting, including: personalized timeline markers to easily browse the recordings by when you joined or left, when a screen was shared, and when your name was mentioned; browse recordings by speakers, chapters, and topics; as well as access AI-generated meeting notes, tasks, and jump to name mentions in the transcript.

CurrentVersion.title: Whiteboard: Text Styles
CurrentVersion.description: This introduces the ability to choose between three different text styles, allowing greater flexibility and personalization of text in whiteboards.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Ability to duplicate an existing town hall for simplified event creation
CurrentVersion.description: Organizers can schedule a new town hall by duplicating information from an existing scheduled one. This includes duplicating information such as details, presenters, theming, and more. The organizer can also edit and update the information as needed for the new event.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Chat for organizers and presenters in town hall
CurrentVersion.description: Organizers, co-organizers, and presenters can chat privately in a separate chat from attendees. This chat is available to access before, during, and after the event.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft 365 admin center: Usage reports - Microsoft Copilot with Graph-grounded chat
CurrentVersion.description: Microsoft Copilot with Graph-grounded chat usage metrics will be included in the Copilot for Microsoft 365 Usage report. This new feature provides additional usage insights and informs adoption strategy decisions for Microsoft Copilot in your organization.

CurrentVersion.title: OneDrive: New empty state images
CurrentVersion.description: You will see new and improved images and text in various views on OneDrive for Web when there are no files associated with those views. These images will appear in new OneDrive accounts that have no stored files, and they may appear in existing OneDrive accounts that have no recent, favorited, shared, or recycled files. As an example, if you have no favorited files, you will see an image of a star with text that reads “Items you favorite will show up here."

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Pulse - Integration into Microsoft Copilot Dashboard from Viva Insights
CurrentVersion.description: Initiate a Copilot impact survey that helps leaders and IT admins understand the return on investment of rolling out Copilot and AI tools across their organizations. Viva Pulse provides a way for organizations to capture sentiment data that maps to work patterns data from Viva Insights to measure AI adoption.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Custom background for Teams Rooms on Android
CurrentVersion.description: IT admins can upload custom background images on the Teams admin center to reinforce their company brand on their Teams Rooms devices. The main room display, extended room display, and touch console can each have its own specific background image. PNG, JPG, and JPEG, formats are supported. This feature is only available with the Teams Rooms Pro license.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Custom background for Teams Rooms on Android
CurrentVersion.description: IT admins can upload custom background images on the Teams admin center to reinforce their company brand on their Teams Rooms devices. The main room display, extended room display, and touch console can each have its own specific background image. PNG, JPG, and JPEG, formats are supported. This feature is only available with the Teams Rooms Pro license.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Audit - New Exchange and SharePoint Logs for Microsoft Purview Audit Standard Users
CurrentVersion.description: ,Microsoft Purview is expanding access to wider cloud security activity events for Microsoft Exchange and SharePoint. As part of the changes, standard users of Purview Audit will begin to generate four new Microsoft Exchange and SharePoint events that were previously generated only for Audit Premium licensed users: MailItemsAccessed, Send, SearchQueryInitiatedExchange, and SearchQueryInitiatedSharepoint. The following logs will differ based on the user’s license and additional metadata will be added to Exchange logs when the user is assigned an Audit Premium license: SensitivityLabel for MailItemsAccessed.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Drag and drop to download attachments and emails in the new Outlook for Windows
CurrentVersion.description: Users can drag and drop attachments and emails from the new Outlook for Windows to their desktops or local folders to download them directly to that location.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Trigger Power automate workflows as outcome of DLP rule match
CurrentVersion.description: ,This introduces a new DLP rule action to trigger custom Power automate workflows when a DLP rule is violated.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Trigger Power automate workflows as outcome of DLP rule match
CurrentVersion.description: ,This introduces a new DLP rule action to trigger custom Power automate workflows when a DLP rule is violated.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Zero Touch Provisioning of Microsoft Teams Rooms on Windows devices
CurrentVersion.description: Zero touch provisioning is a feature that allows you to deploy Microsoft Teams Rooms on Windows devices without any physical intervention at the site. It leverages Windows Autopilot and auto-login technologies to automate the enrollment and configuration of the devices from the cloud, using the credentials stored in the Microsoft Teams Rooms Pro Management. With Zero touch provisioning, you can reduce the deployment time and cost and improve the security and compliance.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams for Education: iOS/Android Parent link for School Connection
CurrentVersion.description: Allows parents to connect to School Connection in Teams for Education by clicking the iOS/Android mobile link provided by their school’s administration.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Meeting ID and passcode to join Teams Rooms on Android
CurrentVersion.description: IT Admins can configure and require a meeting ID and passcode to join a meeting on Teams Rooms on Android to ensure a level of security and privacy. This feature is only available with the Teams Rooms Pro license.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Ability to change language on Microsoft Teams Rooms on Windows
CurrentVersion.description: Users can change the default app language on Microsoft Teams Rooms on Windows by tapping "More" and then "Language" on the room console. Admins can select up to three languages that users can pick from in the room.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Search: Video Search in Bing, Office.com, SharePoint
CurrentVersion.description: Our new Video vertical on Bing, Office.com, and SharePoint will provide better search capabilities for videos in your organization.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: screen recorder on mobile device
CurrentVersion.description: You can use Teams on your Android device to record your screen and share it with others in any channel or chat. Just press and hold the camera icon next to the compose box and then tap the screen recorder icon to begin the recording.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Meeting recap and meeting artifacts automatically shared in chat after meeting
CurrentVersion.description: Shortly after a meeting ends, meeting participants will automatically get a set of all the artifacts from the meeting in the meeting chat. Included in this set is a quick entry point to the meeting recap page, the transcript, the recording, Collaborative notes, any files that were shared, a link to any Whiteboard that was used, and the meeting details like date and time of the meeting event. For Teams Premium users, in addition to the entry point to intelligent recap, users will also see highlights like number of speakers, number of name mentions, and suggested tasks.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Expanded incoming call setting options for Teams Phone Mobile users
CurrentVersion.description: Teams Phone Mobile users will now the flexibility to choose whether group calls, calls received as part of a call queue, and meeting nudges are received natively on their mobile phone or in the Teams app. This new capability enables greater flexibility and mobility and allows users to easily move these calls between their native dialer or the Teams app without interruption.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Expanded incoming call setting options for Teams Phone Mobile users
CurrentVersion.description: Teams Phone Mobile users will now the flexibility to choose whether group calls, calls received as part of a call queue, and meeting nudges are received natively on their mobile phone or in the Teams app. This new capability enables greater flexibility and mobility and allows users to easily move these calls between their native dialer or the Teams app without interruption.

CurrentVersion.title: OneDrive: Copilot in OneDrive
CurrentVersion.description: Copilot in OneDrive, available on OneDrive for Web, will allow you to ask questions and get information from files in your OneDrive without having to open the files. It will also summarize one or multiple files. Copilot in OneDrive will work on the following file types: DOC, DOCX, FLUID, LOOP, PPT, PPTX, XLSX, PDF, ODT, ODP, RTF, ASPX, RTF, TXT, HTM, and HTML. Copilot in OneDrive requires a Microsoft Copilot for Microsoft 365 license.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Edge: Moving Managed Site Indicator (Briefcase icon) into the lock icon in the address bar omnibox
CurrentVersion.description: The briefcase icon which signals that a page is managed, has been moved into the lock icon within the address bar. If an admin would like to see whether there are protections for a given page, they can click to open the lock icon in the address bar to look for the briefcase icon.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Ultrasound proximity join admin controls for Teams Rooms on Windows
CurrentVersion.description: IT admins can use XML files to enable two proximity join settings for Teams Rooms on Windows: enabling ultrasound signals for a user to accurately find and choose a room to join a meeting from, and whether the Teams Rooms automatically accepts the ring from the user's laptop to join the meeting.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Workflows within File Chiclet
CurrentVersion.description: You will now be able to run instant workflows and create new file workflows via the file chiclet overflow menu (...)

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft To Do: Grid view for tasks in Microsoft To Do
CurrentVersion.description: Tasks can now be seen in a grid view in the web version of Microsoft To Do as well as when using To Do in other apps like Microsoft Outlook.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Collaborative notes in GCC and GCC-H
CurrentVersion.description: Collaborative notes allow meeting attendees to co-create and collaborate on their meeting agenda, notes, and action items.  Since Collaborative notes are a Loop component, it is always in sync regardless of how many places they live in.  Assigned Tasks in Collaborative notes automatically sync with ToDo & Planner.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Defender for Office 365: Copy simulation action in Attack Simulation Training
CurrentVersion.description: Using the copy simulation action button, Attack simulation administrators will be able to effortlessly duplicate existing simulations and make necessary edits to introduce fresh and tailored simulation scenarios.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Optimize for Video setting for screensharing
CurrentVersion.description: Provide setting to optimize screen sharing for video clip by reducing the lag and improving the quality of video playback when sharing video clips in Teams meetings

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Breakout rooms support for Microsoft Teams Rooms on Windows
CurrentVersion.description: With breakout room support, Teams Rooms on Windows can be added to a breakout room and moved in and out of the main room making it easy for breakout session coordination.
